name: Calculate Hours for FAT Testing Documentation
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA FAT Testing Documentation:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((4*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Interfaces)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Interfaces)*>))*0.25)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(((4*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Interfaces)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Interfaces)*>))*0.25)) *0.25) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){<* Eval(((4*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Interfaces)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Additional Power Supply Boxes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Interfaces)*>))*0.25)) *0.25*1.1) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
